'''Randy Gallegos''' (born [[31 October]] [[1974]]) is an American fantasy artist. In the 1990s, he was commissioned by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] to create art for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]]. Later on, as a [[Magic: The Gathering]] artist, he created art for the [[The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth|Tales of Middle-earth]] expansion.

While he was initially an acrylic artist, he started working primarily in oils in 1998.<ref name=CCGA>{{CCGA|entry=Gallegos, Randy Richard}}, pp. 135-136</ref>
